post_content_localized.en:
Get ready for Schindler’s List, Scarface and In The Soup at this year’s Tribeca Film Festival.

What started in 2001 to help revitalize the city, the Tribeca Film Festival®, in its 17th year, is nothing short of amazing. This celebrity studded affair is the perfect creative platform for filmmakers to present their work in a demonstration of art uniting community.

Guests will be treated to the art of storytelling presented in a variety of formats including film, television, virtual reality, gaming, music, and online work for not only well-known filmmakers and artists but emerging and creators.

The Tribeca Film Festival takes place April 18th – 29th at various locations throughout the city. Highlights of the 2018 events include:

  • Anniversary screenings of Schindler’s List, Scarface and In the Soup with post-screening discussions that include contributions by Steve Buscemi, Brian De Palma, Beng Kingsley, Liam Neeson, Al Pacion, Michelle Pfeiffer, Sam Rockwell, Steven Spielberg.
  • Tribeca Talks with Alec Baldwin, Edward Burns, Bradley Cooper, Claire Danes, Jamie Foxx, Lesli Link Glatter, Spike Lee, John Legend, Nacy Meyers, Sarah Jessica Parker, Alexander Payne, Laura Poitras, Jason Reitman and more.

Select viewing packages as well as individual event tickets on sale now. 

The Tribeca Film Festival is one of our favorite spring season events in NYC and everyone here at The Manhattan Club hopes you enjoy it all!
